sentences.en: 'I never intended to 'specialise' in water balloons,' he added.
sentences.cn: “我从来都没有打算“专门研究”水球，”他补充道。

sentences.en: 'I never intended to 'specialise' in water balloons,' he added. 'The idea was to create some interesting images and then move on to another subject.
sentences.cn: “我从来都没有打算“专门研究”水球，”他补充道。“这个主意是为了拍一些有趣的图片然后转移到另外的主题上。”

sentences.en: As Adam Smith observed two centuries ago when you specialise you get better youyou produce more.
sentences.cn: 正如亚当·斯密在两个世纪前所观察到的那样,专业化分工使得人们工作更出色,产出更多.

sentences.en: As you know, we specialise in electronic games.
sentences.cn: 正如你们多了解的, 我们专门经营电子游戏.

sentences.en: Every morning she attends Rainbow House, where they specialise in helping children like her.
sentences.cn: 每天早晨她都会去彩虹之家, 那里专门帮助像她一样的孩子.

sentences.en: Lian: Well, we specialise in white teas. It's a growing market.
sentences.cn: 丽安: 嗯, 我们经营的是“白茶 ”, 这种茶的市场正在逐步扩大.

sentences.en: Most of the staff specialise in the care of children.
sentences.cn: 多数员工都掌握专业的儿童保育知识。

sentences.en: Our company specialise in providing high quality wall and floor slab formwork systems.
sentences.cn: 我司专业提供优质墙面和地板楼板模板系统.

sentences.en: Second, its firms specialise in innovative , high - value - added products.
sentences.cn: 其次, 这里的公司精于运作 高附加值 的新式产品.

sentences.en: Small stores and delicatessens specialise in cheese.
sentences.cn: 一些小店和熟食店专营奶酪.

sentences.en: This could be more difficult in small economies which specialise in relatively fewer sectors.
sentences.cn: 这对于那些专攻范围相对较窄的若干个产业的小型经济体来说难度更大.

sentences.en: We have chosen to specialise within the hospitality industry, by offering only experiences of exceptional quality.
sentences.cn: 我们目标明确,对酒店服务业心无旁骛, 并以质量为重.

sentences.en: Yet he decided, at around 50, that to remain academically competitive he had to specialise.
sentences.cn: 50岁左右时, 为了保持学术竞争性他决定专攻某专业.
